def solve(arr, curr_min, curr_max):
    return curr_max - curr_min - 2*min(curr_max - curr_min, min(arr.count(curr_min), arr.count(curr_max)))

n = int(input())
arr = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

curr_min = min(arr)
curr_max = max(arr)

print(solve(arr, curr_min, curr_max))
